sentences.en: An iron case will keep the earth's magnetism away from the compass.
sentences.cn: 铁箱子能使地球磁力不影响指南针.

sentences.en: But nobody had previously worked out a theory about magnetism.
sentences.cn: 但还从未有人研究出磁学理论.

sentences.en: Generators use magnetism in producing a flow of electricity ( or electrons ).
sentences.cn: 发电机利用磁性产生电 ( 或电子 ) 流.

sentences.en: He wrote about Gillespie's effervescence, magnetism and commitment.
sentences.cn: 他写到了吉莱斯皮的活泼、魅力和献身精神。

sentences.en: Henry said something banal about the President's charm and magnetism.
sentences.cn: 亨利把总统如何有魅力和吸引人一类的琐事讲了讲.

sentences.en: His success showed his magnetism of courage and devotion.
sentences.cn: 他的成功表现了他的胆量和热诚的魅力.

sentences.en: If a magnet loses its magnetism it will no longer attract things.
sentences.cn: 磁石如果失去磁力,就不能再吸东西了.

sentences.en: In Australia I believe that they call it animal magnetism.
sentences.cn: 我相信，在澳大利亚，他们称之为动物磁性。

sentences.en: Later, she would describe his magnetism as irresistible.
sentences.cn: 她过后说起时会形容他的魅力难以抵挡。

sentences.en: She was not at all vivid, and had little sex magnetism.
sentences.cn: 她不大有生气, 不大有女性的魅力.

sentences.en: The principal structural element in magnetism is the domain.
sentences.cn: 在磁学中的主要结构单元是磁畴.

sentences.en: There was no doubting the animal magnetism of the man.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，这个男人身上透着一种野性魅力。

sentences.en: This book is about the earth's magnetism.
sentences.cn: 这本书是有关于地磁的.

sentences.en: We know about magnetism by the way magnets act.
sentences.cn: 我们通过磁铁的作用知道磁性是怎么一回事.

words.tran_cn: 地磁的；有磁性的；有吸引力的
磁铁；[电磁] 磁体；磁石
磁强计；[电磁] 磁力计
磁性，磁力；[电磁]磁学；吸引力

trans.tran_cn: 磁性，磁力，磁学，吸引力，催眠术
trans.tran_en: the physical force that makes two metal objects pull towards each other or push each other apart
